Comment: It’s about being effective and not just right.  Facism is on the march and we’re messaging the plight of one person.  It’s a terrible, sad, and frustrating story and everyone should feel as passionately as you do but guess what?  They don’t.  It’s complicated because people are complicated.  No amount of telling them to fuck off will break through.  It’s a crisis, tell people how it will affect them.  Dont stop telling them.
